turns.content: Can the word momentous be applied to something like an iconic dress from an old television show? Like "the actress extolled the momentous gown which was custom made foe the season finale"

Yes, the word "momentous" can be applied to something like an iconic dress from an old television show. The word "momentous" means "having great significance or importance," so it could certainly be used to describe a dress that holds a lot of meaning or significance to fans of the show.
